type.description: Tooltip type, can be set to default primary info success warning danger
type.description_zh: Tooltip type, can be set to default primary info success warning danger

strategy.description: Tooltip position strategy, optional value is absolute fixed
strategy.description_zh: Tooltip position strategy, optional value is absolute fixed

offset-x.description: The x-axis offset, relative to the tooltip-aligned position
offset-x.description_zh: The x-axis offset, relative to the tooltip-aligned position

offset-y.description: The y-axis offset, relative to the tooltip-aligned position
offset-y.description_zh: The y-axis offset, relative to the tooltip-aligned position

teleport.description: The location of the tooltip mount
teleport.description_zh: The location of the tooltip mount

same-width.description: Whether to same width as trigger element
same-width.description_zh: Whether to same width as trigger element

trigger.description: Tooltip trigger method, optional value is click hover, click is triggered when clicked, hover is triggered when hovered
trigger.description_zh: Tooltip trigger method, optional value is click hover, click is triggered when clicked, hover is triggered when hovered

reference.description: The associated trigger element selector is used to specify specific child elements as trigger elements
reference.description_zh: The associated trigger element selector is used to specify specific child elements as trigger elements

close-on-click-reference.description: Whether to close the menu when clicking the reference element
close-on-click-reference.description_zh: Whether to close the menu when clicking the reference element

close-on-key-escape.description: Whether to support keyboard ESC to close the tooltip
close-on-key-escape.description_zh: Whether to support keyboard ESC to close the tooltip

events.name: open
events.description: Triggered when the Tooltip is opened
events.description_zh: Triggered when the Tooltip is opened

events.name: opened
events.description: Triggered when the open Tooltip animation ends
events.description_zh: Triggered when the open Tooltip animation ends

events.name: close
events.description: Triggered when the Tooltip is closed
events.description_zh: Triggered when the Tooltip is closed

events.name: closed
events.description: Triggered when the closing Tooltip animation ends
events.description_zh: Triggered when the closing Tooltip animation ends

events.name: click-outside
events.description: Triggered when clicking outside the tooltip
events.description_zh: Triggered when clicking outside the tooltip

slots.name: click-outside
slots.description: Triggered when clicking outside the menu
slots.description_zh: Triggered when clicking outside the menu
